name: Joe Luppolson The Crafter
description:
Explore a little open world map and defeat different kinds of enemies to gather materials; with these, you can then craft more complex artifacts that you can use during combat (sword, shields, potions and... sand castles?).

There are (almost) 30 crafteble items, each one with unique traits!

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam and it was build in three days; unfortunatly, we were not able to finish every aspect of the game (there still is no boss, no audio and there are a few things to fix here and there), but the game is already an enjoieble experience, and we plan to fix (and add) various things in the next few days!
